article_title: Not only does Gary Oldman offend people, he also wrestles with them
article_text:
Topics: anti-semitic comments, Gary Oldman, Mel Gibson, Video, Wrestling, Entertainment News

Given his recent offensive rant in Playboy magazine, in which Oldman uttered a string of racist, sexist and anti-Semitic comments (the latter of which he apologized for), it maybe not be the best time for Oldman to promote himself with a comedy routine about assaulting strangers. But that is exactly what the actor did on “Jimmy Kimmel Live” Wednesday night, when he introduced the world to his favorite new contact sport, Stranger Wrestling. Here you go, watch Gary Oldman attack people for three long minutes. Remember, it’s only Thursday — who knows what that rascal will do tonight!
